alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 11:37PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Brief Periods of Wintry Mix Possible Tonight... Showers will move through the area this evening. Showers will be a mix of snow, sleet, freezing rain, and plain rain as surface temperatures fall to near or just below freezing. Some light icing is possible in areas that see freezing rain. Areas most susceptible to freezing rain overnight will be the higher terrain in and north of the notches in New Hampshire, and in the western Maine mountains. The Connecticut River Valley stands the best chance of warming above freezing by dawn, minimizing morning travel impacts. Precautionary/Preparedness Actions... Icy roads are possible in any areas that see freezing rain...producing hazardous travel conditions. Please use caution if you must travel.

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
